lead_paragraph: BAUMANN--F. Gregory, PhD, MBA, of Point Lookout, NY on May 26, 2016 at the age of 74. Beloved husband of Ellen McPhillips Baumann. Loving brother of Eleanor, Kevin (the late Patricia), and the late Jean (Lynn Hurt). Cherished brother-in-law of Mary Lee (Andrew) Hartzell, Michael (Jo An) McPhillips, and the late George (Mary Lou) McPhillips. Adored by many nieces and nephews. Family will receive friends Sunday, 2-5pm and 7-9pm, at the Charles J. O'Shea Funeral Home: 603 Wantagh Avenue (Exit 28N SS Pkwy) Wantagh, NY. Mass of Christian Burial will be held Monday, 9:30am, at Our Lady of the Miraculous Medal R.C. Church Point Lookout, NY. Cremation Private. www.osheafuneral.com 1

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  BAUMANN, F. GREGORY, PHD, MBA, OF POINT LOOKOUT, NY ON MAY 26, 2016 AT THE AGE OF 74. BELOVED HUSBAND OF ELLEN MCPHILLIPS BAUMANN. LOVING BROTHER OF ELEANOR, KEVIN (THE LATE PATRICIA), AND THE LATE JEAN (LYNN HURT). CHERISHED BROTHER, IN, LAW OF MARY LEE (ANDREW) HARTZELL, MICHAEL (JO AN) MCPHILLIPS, AND THE LATE GEORGE (MARY LOU) MCPHILLIPS. ADORED BY MANY NIECES AND NEPHEWS. FAMILY WILL RECEIVE FRIENDS SUNDAY, 2, 5PM AND 7, 9PM, AT THE CHARLES J. O'SHEA FUNERAL HOME: 603 WANTAGH AVENUE (EXIT 28N SS PKWY) WANTAGH, NY. MASS OF CHRISTIAN BURIAL WILL BE HELD MONDAY, 9:30AM, AT OUR LADY OF THE MIRACULOUS MEDAL R.C. CHURCH POINT LOOKOUT, NY. CREMATION PRIVATE. WWW.OSHEAFUNERAL.COM 1
